title: Charles Rennie Mackintosh
creator_credit: W. Thomson and S E F A Productions
brief_description: The work and achievements of Charles Rennie Mackintosh, architect and painter, in relation to Scottish traditions, the style of his own time and the Art Nouveau movement. Commentary: R. Horn.
